wikipedia_page.main: Steven Bastien (born 13 March 1963) is a former English cricketer. Bastien was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium-fast and played as a swing bowler for Glamorgan County Cricket Club between 1988 and 1994. He was born at Stepney in London in 1963 and played cricket in Dominica before completing his education at Haringey College in London.
